INIT_OPTIONS_ERROR: [ERROR]: VWO-SDK {date} Options should be of type object
INIT_OPTIONS_SDK_KEY_ERROR: [ERROR]: VWO-SDK {date} Please provide the sdkKey in the options and should be a of type string
INIT_OPTIONS_ACCOUNT_ID_ERROR: [ERROR]: VWO-SDK {date} Please provide VWO account ID in the options and should be a of type string|number
SETTINGS_NULL_OR_EMPTY: Settings cannot be null or empty. Settings will not be set.
ERROR_SETTING_SETTINGS_MANUALLY: Error occurred while setting settings manually: {err}
INIT_OPTIONS_INVALID: Invalid key:{key} passed in options. Should be of type:{correctType} and greater than equal to 1000
INVALID_BATCH_EVENTS_CONFIG: Invalid batch events configuration. Events per request should be greater than 0 and less than 5000, and request time interval should be greater than 0
INVALID_EVENTS_PER_REQUEST: Events_per_request values is invalid (should be greater than 0 and less than 5000). Using default value of events_per_request parameter : 100
INVALID_REQUEST_TIME_INTERVAL: Request_time_interval values is invalid (should be greater than 0). Using default value of request_time_interval parameter : 600
BATCH_FLUSH_FAILED: Failed to send batch events. Retrying next time.
BATCHING_NOT_ENABLED: Batching is not enabled. Pass batchEvents in the SDK configuration while invoking init API.
MEG_NO_WINNER_CAMPAIGN_FOUND: No winner campaign found for MEG group: {groupId}
SETTINGS_SCHEMA_INVALID: Settings are not valid. Failed schema validation
SETTINGS_JSON_PARSE_ERROR: Invalid JSON format in settings. Error at path:{path}. {error}
SETTINGS_ACCOUNT_ID_MISSING: Settings are not valid. AccountId field is missing or null in settings
SETTINGS_VERSION_MISSING: Settings are not valid. Version field is missing or null in settings
SETTINGS_SDK_KEY_MISSING: Settings are not valid. SdkKey field is missing or null in settings
POLLING_FETCH_SETTINGS_FAILED: Error while fetching VWO settings with polling
API_INVALID_PARAM: Key:{key} passed to API:{apiName} is not of valid type. Got type:{type}, should be:{correctType}
API_SETTING_INVALID: Settings are not valid. Contact VWO Support
API_CONTEXT_INVALID: Context should be an object and must contain a mandatory key - id, which is User ID
INVALID_RETRY_CONFIG: Retry config is invalid. Should be of type:object
FEATURE_NOT_FOUND: Feature not found for the key:{featureKey}
EVENT_NOT_FOUND: Event:{eventName} not found in any of the features' metrics
STORED_DATA_ERROR: Error in getting data from storage.
STORING_DATA_ERROR: Key:{featureKey} is not valid. Not able to store data into storage
INVALID_GATEWAY_URL: Please provide a valid URL for VWO Gateway Service while initializing the SDK
NETWORK_CALL_RETRY_FAILED: Max retries reached. Request failed for {endPoint}, Error: {err}
USER_ID_NULL_OR_EMPTY: User ID passed cannot be null or empty
SDK_INIT_EVENT_FAILED: Error occurred while sending SDK init event. Error:{err}
NETWORK_CALL_RETRY_ATTEMPT: Request failed for {endPoint}, Error: {err}. Retrying in {delay} seconds, attempt {attempt} of {maxRetries}
NETWORK_CALL_FAILURE_AFTER_MAX_RETRIES: Network call for {extraData} failed after {attempts} retry attempt(s). Got Error: {err}
